item.description:
Take a vacation day and start enjoying the summer!

Take the day off from work, your job hunt, or your daily routine and join me at the beach!

Wednesday, June 30 predicts sunny and 76 degrees! A perfect beach day!

Showers and restrooms available, click here for more details about beach...

If you would like to carpool, include your town in the comments box when you RSVP YES.

If you are going to meet us there, call me when you arrive and we will figure out a meeting spot: 508-381-1529.

Parking is $7 per car, unless you have a Mass State Park season pass.

Carpool 8:30 am from Plains Park, 60 Cedar Street (Route 85) Milford.
item.name: Big Waves Beach Day - Horseneck Beach
